name: part_008
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ1stソロライブ】常闇トワ 1stソロライブ ＂Break your ×××＂【無料チラ見せ】 [WlSJEyV6Emw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: MC section. Towa hypes up the audience and transitions to the next song.
Performance of the song 'Palette' in a new outfit.
End of the free portion of the live stream with a closing graphic and background music.

subtitles.original: Ready steady set!
subtitles.english: Ready steady set!

subtitles.original: 悪魔と連弾　肺繋いで　相手にならないと喰らうほど
subtitles.english: A duet with a devil, lungs connected, so much that you'll be eaten if you can't keep up

subtitles.original: Debby Debby ガッツだ少年！ Vivi Vivi 世界はフィクション
subtitles.english: Debby Debby, show some guts, boy! Vivi Vivi, the world is fiction

subtitles.original: 健全なモードなんて　今だけは全てを恨めばいい
subtitles.english: As for a wholesome mode, just for now you should resent everything

subtitles.original: Debby Debby 悪魔の輪　闇を知ってイェイ
subtitles.english: Debby Debby, the devil's ring, knowing the darkness, yay

subtitles.original: 消えない寂しさとな　言えない傷跡を繋げ
subtitles.english: Connect the loneliness that doesn't fade with the scars you can't talk about

subtitles.original: 歩みを止めないなんて　お利口な人間は
subtitles.english: Not stopping their progress, those well-behaved humans

subtitles.original: 時代を宣告して死んじゃって　光を生み出した
subtitles.english: Proclaimed the era and died, giving birth to the light

subtitles.original: 悪魔の所業で　お利口な人間　イェイ
subtitles.english: With the devil's work, the well-behaved human, yay

subtitles.original: 悪魔と連弾　吐息吐いて　どこも光がないな　渦を巻く
subtitles.english: A duet with a devil, breathing sighs, there's no light anywhere, swirling in a vortex

subtitles.original: Debby Debby 懐かしい快鳴 Vivi Vivi 奈落の底から
subtitles.english: Debby Debby, a nostalgic pleasant sound, Vivi Vivi, from the bottom of the abyss

subtitles.original: 人間界カードなんて　常識がないなら奪われる
subtitles.english: As for the human world cards, if you have no common sense, they'll be stolen

subtitles.original: Debby Debby 悪魔の輪　影を撃って
subtitles.english: Debby Debby, the devil's ring, shoot the shadow

subtitles.original: 悪魔と連弾　肺繋いで　相手にならないと喰らうほど
subtitles.english: A duet with a devil, lungs connected, so much that you'll be eaten if you can't keep up

subtitles.original: Debby Debby ガッツだ少年！ Vivi Vivi 世界はフィクション
subtitles.english: Debby Debby, show some guts, boy! Vivi Vivi, the world is fiction

subtitles.original: 健全なモードなんて　今だけは全てを恨めばいい
subtitles.english: As for a wholesome mode, just for now you should resent everything

subtitles.original: Debby Debby 悪魔の輪　闇を知ってイェイ
subtitles.english: Debby Debby, the devil's ring, knowing the darkness, yay

subtitles.original: ヘイ！ ヘイ！ ヘイ！ ヘイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: ヘイ！ ヘイ！ ヘイ！ ヘイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: まだまだもっと！声出していけるんじゃないのー！？
subtitles.english: More, more! You can shout even louder, can't you!?

subtitles.original: いくぞー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: だって私　いつまでも　ずっと虜
subtitles.english: Because I'll always be captivated by you

subtitles.original: 君以外は　もうありえない
subtitles.english: No one else is possible anymore

subtitles.original: ちょっといつも　フラフラ　そっぽ向くの
subtitles.english: Always a bit unsteady, looking away

subtitles.original: 思わせぶり　揺るがないなら
subtitles.english: Suggestive, if you're unshakeable

subtitles.original: 好きだよって　微笑んで　誤魔化してもし
subtitles.english: Even if I smile and say "I love you" to hide it

subtitles.original: あのね　無理だよって　逃げるよって
subtitles.english: You know, saying it's impossible, that you'll run away

subtitles.original: ガラスハートを　振り回して　骨の髄まで　しゃぶりつくして
subtitles.english: Swinging a glass heart around, sucking it to the marrow of the bone

subtitles.original: 壊れるほど　惑わせて　You know, You know, You know
subtitles.english: Bewildering me enough to break me, You know, You know, You know

subtitles.original: ラブストーリーを　転がして　時空金剛　駆け抜けて
subtitles.english: Rolling the love story, running through space-time diamond

subtitles.original: 痺れる声を　雷鳴
subtitles.english: A numbing voice, a thunderclap

subtitles.original: 無料パートは終了いたしました！
subtitles.english: The free part has ended!

subtitles.original: ご視聴ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you for watching!
